Class NexmoPinningConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nexmo.client.NexmoPinningConfig

  • public final class NexmoPinningConfig
extends java.lang.Object

    Configuration data for Pinning the identity of the sdk backend services.

     new NexmoPinningConfig.fromPublicKeys("publickey1", "publickey2");
